prompt:
Nurse: Excellent. Once you get to O'Connor Hospital, your check-in location will be on the 1st Floor. Does that sound good to you?

Patient: Yes, ma'am. I will be there.

Nurse: Great. Is there anything else about the logistics that���s worrying you or that you'd like to discuss?

Patient: Not at all.

Nurse: I'm glad to hear that. I'd like to move on to discuss your medications. Is it okay if we proceed?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: I see on your chart that you are currently taking Plavix 75 mg once a day. As per the instructions, you were told to stop this medication 7 days prior to the procedure. Have you already stopped taking Plavix?

Patient: Yes. I have.

responses.gpt4: Wonderful. Do you have any questions about Plavix or why you needed to stop it before the procedure?
responses.our_model: That's great to hear. Do you have any questions about Plavix or why it was necessary to stop it before your procedure?
